subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: No. 32 Fabio Fognini came from two sets down to upset Rafael Nadal, and Serena Williams overcame a sluggish start to defeat Bethanie Mattek-Sands.
snippet: No. 32 Fabio Fognini came from two sets down to upset Rafael Nadal, and Serena Williams overcame a sluggish start to defeat Bethanie Mattek-Sands.
